attributes.action: Vote of No confidence in Sadiq Khan as London Mayor
attributes.additional_details: It has been going on far too long with Sadiq Khan as London Mayor. He hasn't developed any thing successful only inflation for city workers. He squandered his voters views on his so called "Boroughs of Culture". This funding as with others he has dealt with needs formal discussions and investigation.  TFL is a mess and has so many tube strikes or close calls it shows he is not competent.
attributes.background: Start formal discussions about who can rebuild TFL. Vital infrastructure to help London recover from the current crisis'

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for elected representatives to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.
